# 
Take Control of
Type 2 Diabetes
Lifestyle First, Improvement Inevitable, Remission Possible
Covered in BC, AB, and ON
Get the Lifestyle Prescription to reverse Type 2 Diabetes. Our Canadian, physician-led program guides you to safe and sustainable changes, allowing you to take control of your health. 
Our Program
### Physician-Led
You will work with a Canadian physician from your province to learn and adopt sustainable lifestyle changes. 
### Safe & Supervised
Lowering your blood sugar can result in some medications being reduced or eliminated. 
Our physicians work with you to make these changes when needed while keeping your family doctor informed. 
### 100% Virtual
All group medical sessions and consultations with your team are conducted through video calls. No travel or sitting in waiting rooms is required. 
How it works
## Our 12-Week Program
Fully Covered in BC, AB, and ON
Our program is 100% virtual. You can access sessions and materials from the comfort of your home. 
### Virtual Physician Visits
Consultations with our physicians are done by video call, and can be completed from any computer, tablet, or phone. 
### 12 Virtual Group Sessions
In groups of 15-30, you will attend weekly virtual sessions with a physician where you can ask questions and hear about the successes and challenges of others. 
![](https://lifestylerx.co/images/marketing/VideoLessons.png)
### Videos & Weekly Lessons
Watch videos explaining core concepts, print out reference guides and cheatsheets, and complete ongoing learning exercises.

Every day

3-4 nights per week
Less than 3 nights per week
### 8.9

### Self-Assessments & Exercises
Answer questions and complete exercises to show where you’re doing well and where you need to focus.

Report

### Personal Health Reports
Different people are, well, different. Understand what your lab results and other markers show about your current health and diabetic reversal path.

Diabetes Reversal
## How Does Diabetes Reversal Work?
Our program is based on clinical and scientific research conducted in the last decade, which has demonstrated that Type 2 Diabetes is a disease driven by two interrelated cycles that can be reversed. 
We break down and simplify the science of Type 2 Diabetes progression and reversal here: 
[ The Science of Diabetes Reversal ](https://lifestylerx.io/<https:/lifestylerx.io/diabetes-reversal>)
Our Approach
## 4+2 Strategy
Our program will teach you the **4+2 Diabetes Reversal Strategy** , focusing on 6 key lifestyle behaviours, involving diet, sleep, light exercise, stress reduction, and more to manage insulin and restore fat burning. 
##  4+2 is Different
Our approach asks you to make small steady changes that you can sustain. Better is more important than perfect.
### No Calorie Counting
We focus on what to eat and when to eat, not how much you eat.
### Common Sense & Whole Foods
We won’t ask you to put butter in your coffee, down nutritional shakes, or do anything else extreme. We apply only common sense & whole food principles.
### Don’t Feel Hungry All the Time
Our bodies can naturally manage our appetite, as long as we feed them foods they recognize.
### Moderate Exercise Only
Whether it’s walking, riding a bike, or running, we only ask you to do exercise you’re comfortable with and can maintain.
### Changes You Can Sustain
We only ask you to make changes that you can sustain — eating foods you will enjoy and eating enough to feel full.
### Learn Why, As Well As How
It’s easier to make changes and sustain them if you know why you’re doing them. We teach you the rationale for each change we ask you to make.
SEE FIRSTHAND
##  See how patients' lives have improved by following the LifestyleRx program 
### Reduce Blood Sugar & A1C
####  Bob, 73, lowered his HbA1C from 10% to 6.7% 
I would highly recommend the program to family and friends... The program gave me the tools to reduce and balance my blood sugar. I only wish I had this information 10 years ago. I have always been interested in reading about diet and exercise and how it benefits the body but this provides very specific information in one place which I was not able to find elsewhere. I also found out that many things that I thought were healthy choices were actually not. I have gained a wealth of knowledge about diabetes.
####  Bob, age 73 
### Reach Your Goals
####  Alicia, 57, finally succeeded after 25 years with Type 2 Diabetes 
I have been a type 2 diabetic for about 25 years and attended two previous in hospital clinics and been in the care of some pretty good specialists. What I have seen is the way diabetes is now approached and this program is an excellent example of that change in thinking. [This program] has created an integrated and functional approach and provides such a good understanding of the underlying causes and solutions to managing or even reversing type 2 diabetes. I couldn't recommend this program strongly enough!
####  Alicia, age 57

### LifestyleRx Overview

**LifestyleRx** is a health-tech company founded in 2022, based in White Rock, Canada, and part of the Y Combinator Batch S23. Its mission centers around providing virtual care aimed at reversing Type 2 Diabetes through lifestyle changes guided by medical professionals. With a small but dedicated team of nine employees, LifestyleRx has quickly established itself in the telehealth and healthcare sectors as a promising solution for managing and potentially reversing diabetes.

#### Approach to Diabetes Reversal
At the core of LifestyleRx's program is a structured, physician-led, fully virtual 12-week course. Patients across British Columbia, Alberta, and Ontario can access this program at no cost, fully covered by provincial health plans. The program emphasizes the **4+2 Diabetes Reversal Strategy**, focusing on six key lifestyle changes involving diet, light exercise, sleep, and stress management. Notably, the approach avoids calorie counting and extreme dietary restrictions, relying instead on sensible eating and moderate physical activity tailored to individual capabilities.

#### How It Works
- **Virtual Group Sessions**: Patients participate in weekly group sessions with a physician, discussing struggles and successes in a supportive environment.
- **Personalized Support**: Each participant receives individual consultations with a doctor from their province to tailor the program to their health history and goals.
- **Educational Resources**: The program includes video lessons, self-assessments, and personal health reports to help patients understand their progress.

LifestyleRx is anchored in clinical evidence that suggests Type 2 Diabetes progression can be reversed by altering lifestyle factors. The emphasis on gradual, sustainable changes encourages participants to adopt healthier habits that stick long after the program concludes.

#### Impact and Testimonials
Patients like Bob, age 73, and Alicia, age 57, have shared their success stories, highlighting dramatic improvements in blood sugar levels and overall health after participating in the program. Feedback emphasizes a wealth of newfound knowledge about diabetes management that many had not encountered in traditional medical settings.

#### Community and Professional Outreach
Beyond direct patient care, LifestyleRx actively engages with health professionals, providing resources for primary care providers and pharmacists to refer patients into their program. This collaborative approach extends their reach and potentially enhances patient outcomes across the community.

#### Conclusion
LifestyleRx is paving the way for a new model of care, leveraging technology to provide accessible and effective treatment options for those battling Type 2 Diabetes. With its evidence-based approach, virtual setup, and focus on lifestyle modifications, it represents a promising shift towards preventive healthcare that could inspire a broader revolution in chronic disease management. For more information, visit their website at [lifestylerx.io](https://lifestylerx.io/).
